price: 29. Tonna hinnay isi nafsi yudlume mari sinni kalbi-fayxiixa kataaten ixxiga как aallekal, toysa Yalli makkoyse num tirri haytam matanaay, usun cateynit malón Yallih digaalák.
arabic: بَلِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَهُم بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٖۖ فَمَن يَهۡدِي مَنۡ أَضَلَّ ٱللَّهُۖ وَمَا لَهُم مِّن نَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: bali ittabaʿa alladhīna ẓalamū ahwāahum bighayri ʿil'min faman yahdī man aḍalla al-lahu wamā lahum min nāṣirīna
